data.name: Marble Parkour 2: Roll and roll
data.detailed_description:
Game idea:

Marble Parkour 2 game you need finish different levels to unlock next level to playable. Levels contain different traps like bumpers, smashing platforms, ventilators etc. Also different platforms like swinging platforms and rotating platforms included. Some levels contain power ups which helps playing, like gyrocopter, ball increaser and trampoline
Levels contains star system, faster you finish levels more stars you get. Levels contain also checkpoint system. Also 4 bonus minigame levels included. 2 sidescroller ball game levels and 3 racing ball game levels, where player need drive 4 laps races. Also collect diamonds to collect achievements

Features:


- Different Traps: Rotating platforms, Bumpers, Ventilators, Swingplatform, Smashing platforms
- Swinging system
- Steam achievements
- Over 10 different ball skins
- Checkpoints
- Power ups to help with player progress: Gyrocopter, Super jump, Gravity rotater, Ball increaser etc
- Cannos to shoot ball different places
- Different surfaces
- 9 levels with star rating system. Be faster and get more stars

- Save best time systems
- Training/Tutorial map
- 2 minigames: Sidescroller ball game and racing ball game

data.short_description: Sequel to marble parkour. Roll more and avoid new traps and play different minigames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nividia 900 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: direct x9
